ABOUT US
At FloCareer, we help organizations succeed by finding their prospective 'happy' employee by matching skills with the job requirement.
LEADERSHIP TEAM
Mehul Bhatt
CEO & CoFounder
Ex Cisco Leader, Futurist, Tech Enthusiast
After about 15 years of journey in technology domain across the globe and enjoying various responsibilities from start-ups / small companies to MNC, Mehul plunged into the entrepreneurial voyage with venturing FloCareer. His experience in networking, virtualization, highly-scalable, distributed systems design have helped FloCareer garner immense scalability within a short period of time.
Mohit Jain
COO & CoFounder
Ex-Dell leader, Visionary, Perfectionist
Global IT leader and a seasoned professional with 20 years of IT experience, An expert in Delivery Management, Product & Platform Engineering, Successfully delivered multiple business solutions, Technical implementations of several products on Ecommerce, Online Platform, Multi-tiered & SOA based architecture and Core Business Services. Worked closely with services/product, startup companies like Xerox, Infosys, 4Medica, Citi, Ford and Dell.com
ADVISORS & INVESTORS
Sanjay Nadkarni
Strategic Advisor
Entrepreneur, Investor and Global Leader
A digital entrepreneur with leadership experience in e-commerce, media and telecom. Currently an active angel investor and advisor in multiple startups. In his last assignment, he helped launch and localize Houzz in India. He had set up the local partner environment and recruited the IN team. He focused on growing the IN professional community and improving local engagement. He achieved 2.5x growth. Earlier, he built the babyoye brand from scratch. His journey involved 3 VC funding rounds, acquiring a competitor and finally being acquired by the Mahindra Group. He then transitioned a startup brand to take over the masthead of Mahindra Retail. The fact that a large enterprise group chose to adopt his brand is testimony to work that he did at babyoye. Prior to launching babyoye.com, he held several positions with Airtel’s enterprise business. His roles spanned Pricing & commercial management, product management, network planning, consulting and solutions.
Pravin Agarwala
Strategic Advisor
Entrepreneur, Ex-SAP leader, Dreamer
An industry veteran, a global tech leader, an entrepreneur and a dreamer, Pravin has served the position of VP and Global Head at SAP and has remained as a part of many technology-led startups as advisor and director. At FloCareer, he with his immense knowledge aims to meet the needs through end-to-end lifecycle management of Assessment, Training, and Placement.
Satish Jajodia
Advisor & Investor
Ex-CEO, Education Dynamics, Strategist, Advisor
Accomplished and uniquely versatile executive and general manager with over 24 years’ track record of delivering innovative and impactful results in a wide range of roles and industries. Exceptional problem solver with a keen ability to diagnose business issues and formulate and implement durable solutions.
